price: Àwọn sánmọ̀ fẹ́rẹ̀ fàya pẹ́rẹpẹ̀rẹ nítorí rẹ̀, ilẹ̀ fẹ́rẹ̀ fàya pẹ́rẹpẹ̀rẹ, àwọn àpáta sì fẹ́rẹ̀ dàwó lulẹ̀ gbì
arabic: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرۡنَ مِنۡهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلۡجِبَالُ هَدًّا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: takādu al-samāwātu yatafaṭṭarna min'hu watanshaqqu al-arḍu watakhirru al-jibālu haddan
